text: Kuma a wurin Sa mabudan* gaibi suke, babu wanda yake sanin su face Shi, kuma Yana sanin abin da ke a cikin tudu da ruwa, kuma wani ganye ba ya faɗuwa, face Ya san shi, kuma babu wata ƙwaya a cikin duffan ƙasa, kuma babu ɗanye, kuma babu ƙeƙasasshe, face yana a cikin wani Littafi mai bayyanawa
